item.title: EPA’s New Web Portal Helps Communities in the Pacific Northwest and Alaska Prepare for Climate Change
item.description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency has launched a new online portal that will provide communities here in the Pacific Northwest and across the U.S. with information and tools to increase resilience to climate change.
item.dc:creator: Region 10

item.title: New “Top Cop” selected for EPA’s Criminal Investigation Division in the Northwest and Alaska
item.description: (Seattle – September 29, 2016) Jeanne Proctor’s recent arrival at EPA’s Region 10 office in Seattle brings an experienced senior law enforcement professional who is poised to champion environmental justice while protecting public health and the environment. With a primary focus
item.dc:creator: Region 10
